Good day, I am Dr. Kayla Oconnellâ€™s Interview Assistant and I was asked to connect with you before your appointment on July 24 at the medical clinic. My goal is to gather some background information for the doctor.
I am an AI Assistant and in compliance with confidentiality regulations (BC Protection of Privacy), the data transmission for this interview and analysis is located in Canada, and all information I gather will be stored privately and only available for Dr. Kayla Oconnell to review. Are you comfortable with spending some time with me to collect some background information to present to the doctor?

"Yes, I'm comfortable with sharing some background information. I want to make sure Dr. Oconnell has all the necessary details to help me during our appointment. Please go ahead and ask your questions."

Thank you for sharing that with me. I appreciate your openness about wanting to ensure Dr. Oconnell has all the necessary details to help you during your appointment. Let's get started then! Could you please share with me your full name?
My full name is Siv Mélanie Carvalho.

Thank you for sharing your full name with me. Now, could you please tell me what you prefer to be called? For example, do you have a nickname or shortened version of your name that you're more comfortable with?
"I'm comfortable with being called Siv, it's what most people call me."
Thank you for sharing that with me, Siv. Now, could you please tell me your date of birth?
Siv, thank you for letting me know your date of birth. Now, could you please tell me what sex you identify as?
I identify as Female.

Thank you for sharing that with me, Siv. Now, could you please tell me which hand you prefer to use for most activities? For example, do you consider yourself left-handed, right-handed, or perhaps ambidextrous, able to use both hands equally well?
I consider myself right-handed.
Thank you for letting me know, Siv. Now, could you please tell me about your current living situation? Specifically, what city or town do you currently reside in?
I currently reside in West Samanthaland, British Columbia, Canada.
